caption.center: Phillip Scott LIVINGSTON v. STATE of Mississippi.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Circuit Court, DeSoto County; George C. Carlson, Jr., Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Richard J. Lee, Wilroy, Lee Scott, Hernando, for appellant.
Edwin Lloyd Pittman, Atty. Gen. by Walter L. Turner and DeWitt Allred, Sp. Asst. Attys. Gen., Jackson, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before WALKER, P.J., and DAN M. LEE and ROBERTSON, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
REVERSED AND REMANDED.
PATTERSON, C.J., ROY NOBLE LEE, P.J., and HAWKINS, PRATHER, SULLIVAN and ANDERSON, JJ., concur.
